text_block_list.text: It is said Uma Musume who will one day reach the top have a strong ambition and aura that attracts everyone.
"She" had that aura.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha, ha…!
A neat body that cuts the wind, and long legs that lightly kick the ground. A beautiful yet powerful look that gazes ahead without any hesitation.
And above all, the aura of dignity and fortitude that overflows from her whole body tells everyone to fear the title "Empress"ー

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Fu…
…Before I knew it, time had flown by and the evening sky was dyed in red.
Then, one horse girl approached Air Groove who had seemed to have completed her trainingー

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Air Groove! Sorry to make you wait. I got a bit carried away while running outside…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hmph… you're the same as ever, Suzuka. Well, I figured something like that would happen so I don't mind.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: That aside, do you have the energy left to race?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes, no problem. Let's get started.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ah, Air Groove and Suzuka are gonna race now? Looks like I'll get to see something interesting!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Needless to say, it'll be training between two very talented people! It seems there'll be a lot to learn.
In the blink of an eye there was a whole crowd around the course. With all eyes on them the two began running side by side.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ha, ha, ha…!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Ohh…! Suzuka's runaway never fails to amaze me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: But it doesn't look like Air Groove is gonna let it end like this either. Look… it's like the length difference is just getting her more fired up!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Hm.
Then, just as Silence Suzuka turned the final corner with a huge lead―!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: ―Haa!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Ohhh!? Oi oi, she just closed that distance in one go…!!

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: What amazing spurt strength…! Her decision of when to chase her was wonderful as well. Suzuka can't catch up now…!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Gh…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: This race… is mine!!
A burning fighting spirit, yet, calm judgment. And a tremendous amount of running power… she was amazing at everything.
With the gap between her and Silence Suzuka, Air Groove crossed the goal…
I stood there bewildered, before hearing the excitement of the girls watching the race.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Man, I got to see some good stuff! I wanna go one on one with her next.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: Indeed. With runners as talented as her, she truly shows us running fit to be called ideal…

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: And on top of that, as the vice president of the student council she also supports our daily school life in various ways.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I think saying support is a bit much but… well, it's true she is always helping us out.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I can understand why the ponies look up to her so much. I also aim to be like her.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: …By the way, you there. Seems like you've been staring at Air Groove for a while now.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Yes, you. Who else would I be talking to? I haven't seen your face around here before, are you a new trainer?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Don't tell me, you wanna scout Air Groove?
choice_data_list: If it's possible I'd love to…!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Sheesh, well… you're a bit late for that.

text_block_list.name: Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Air Groove! So this is where you were. Were you doing independent training today as well…?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Yes I was… is there any problem?

text_block_list.name: Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: …No. About tomorrow, is it okay if I change the plans a bit? I have some things to do so I'd like to start 30 minutes later.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Hm. But you've already booked the training course haven't you? If so, I'll proceed with the training regimen myself.

text_block_list.name: Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: Eh? But wouldn't it be better to take the chance to res―

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The debut race is close, as if I could afford to waste a single second.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Besides, I rest as needed without being told. Has there ever been reason for you to change plans up until now?

text_block_list.name: Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: W-Well… no. …I got it. Then, go ahead and train without me.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Haha, as always she's dragging her trainer around by the leash! …But well, it's as you see.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: I'm sure it's disappointing news for you but… Air Groove already has a trainer to watch over her.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: She didn't even show up in the Selection Race so I can't blame you. But well, there's no rule saying you can't be scouted before then.
It seems that other trainers saw Air Groove was special as well…
I left the course that day, with feelings of regret.
